Package org.apache.hadoop.hbase.backup

Class HFileArchiver.FileableStoreFile

java.lang.Object
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.backup.HFileArchiver.File
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.backup.HFileArchiver.FileableStoreFile
Enclosing class:
HFileArchiver
private static class HFileArchiver.FileableStoreFile extends HFileArchiver.File
HFileArchiver.File adapter for a HStoreFile living on a FileSystem .
